title: MD
biography: Fundación Huésped is a nonprofit foundation in Argentina. It was created in 1989 for the purpose of fighting HIV/AIDS, with a specific focus on creating a social environment that would allow the disease to be overcome. Since October 2015, the foundation has maintained a free testing center which allows rapid diagnosis of HIV/AIDS.
aiSummary: Pedro Cahn is a infectious disease specialist with an H-index of 61 at Fundación Huésped (Member). Has been published in JAMA, The Lancet, New England Journal of Medicine. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
